get_all_files(directory)[source]¶

Get a list of all files within a directory and its subdirectories.

Parameters:

directory (str) – The directory path.

Returns:

A list of file paths.

Return type:

list

search_files_with_keyword()[source]¶

Search for files containing a keyword within a directory or a specific file.

Returns:

A dictionary with ‘files’ and ‘errors’ keys. ‘files’ gives the list of file paths that has the keyword,

and ‘errors’ contains the list error messages with file paths.

Return type:

dict

search_keyword_in_docx_file(file_path, keyword)[source]¶

Search for a keyword within a DOCX file.

Parameters:

  • file_path (str) – The path of the DOCX file.

  • keyword (str) – The keyword to search for.

Returns:

True if the keyword is found, False otherwise.

Return type:

bool

  • keyword (str) – The keyword to search for.

Returns:

search_keyword_in_files(files, keyword, common_file_types, skip_file_types)[source]¶

Search for a keyword within a list of files.

Parameters:

  • files (list) – A list of file paths.

  • keyword (str) – The keyword to search for.

  • common_file_types (list) – The list of common file types to search within.

  • skip_file_types (list) – The list of file types to skip.

Returns:

A list of file paths that contain the keyword.

Return type:

list
